notesStmt.note: Wide margins; lines cramped; left rule justified using one or two characters from the following word; II Kings V 8 ואף 13- ישראל.

Condition: folded widthwise; 1v left blank (according to Halper, "2 paper leaves" : "originally it seems to have been one sheet, upon one side of which (not folded) was a letter in Arabic character, the lines being written lengthwise ... Some time later the letter was folded int two, and upon 1a was copied part of the burial service [...] in a Yemenite square hand").
